message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $155?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm really interested in the product. Would you be willing to go lower?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $147.50?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get an even better deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
